entry.title: hunsa/sc24-repro
entry.summary:
SC24 Reproducibility Initiative

About

This repository functions as an extra source of information on topics associated with the Reproducibility Initiative at SC24.

For SC24 Paper Authors

A LaTeX template for the AD/AE Appendices is provided in for-paper-authors.

Paper authors should carefully read the instructions on the SC24 AD/AE Process & Badges page.

For AE Reviewers (Reproducibility / SC24 Planning Committee)
